title: VideoEncoder test fails on osx due to lack of ogv encoder

content.raw:
The VideoEncoder test has been failing on homebrew for a loooooong time:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/72/testReport/(root)/VideoEncoderTest/StartStop/

There are more clues in the console output than in the failed expectations:

~~~
65: [Err] [VideoEncoder.cc:276] Codec for[vp8] not found. Video encoding is not started.
...
65: /Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/ign-common/src/VideoEncoder_TEST.cc:47: Failure
65: Value of: "ogv"
65: Expected: video.Format().c_str()
65: Which is: "mp4"
~~~

The test [explicitly asks to encode a video with type ogv](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/src/2f89e52e0cb54ad3b3e38c61d3a8e6766c2b9cf0/src/VideoEncoder_TEST.cc?at=disable_on_windows&fileviewer=file-view-default#VideoEncoder_TEST.cc-45), but I can confirm that this codec isn't supported by the default installation of ffmpeg on homebrew:

~~~
$ ffmpeg -i video.mp4 video.ogv
...
Automatic encoder selection failed for output stream #0:0.
Default encoder for format ogg (codec theora) is probably disabled.
Please choose an encoder manually.
Error selecting an encoder for stream 0:0
~~~
content.html:
The VideoEncoder test has been failing on homebrew for a loooooong time:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/72/testReport/(root)/VideoEncoderTest/StartStop/

There are more clues in the console output than in the failed expectations:

65: [Err] [VideoEncoder.cc:276] Codec for[vp8] not found. Video encoding is not started.
...
65: /Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/ign-common/src/VideoEncoder_TEST.cc:47: Failure
65: Value of: "ogv"
65: Expected: video.Format().c_str()
65: Which is: "mp4"

The test explicitly asks to encode a video with type ogv, but I can confirm that this codec isn't supported by the default installation of ffmpeg on homebrew:

$ ffmpeg -i video.mp4 video.ogv
...
Automatic encoder selection failed for output stream #0:0.
Default encoder for format ogg (codec theora) is probably disabled.
Please choose an encoder manually.
Error selecting an encoder for stream 0:0
